meanings.definition: Comparative form of the adjective 'faggy', meaning resembling or characteristic of a gay man.
meanings.sent1: The new shirt he bought was even faggier than the one he wore yesterday.
meanings.sent2: Her colorful outfit was much faggier than the usual black and white attire.
meanings.sent3: He joked that his friend's dance moves were so faggier than a rainbow.
meanings.sent4: The city skyline at sunset looked faggier than a pride parade.
meanings.sent5: The flowers in the garden seemed to be in a faggier competition of colors.

meanings.definition: Comparative form of the noun 'fag', meaning a male homosexual.
meanings.sent1: In the movie, the main character was portrayed as a faggier than the other male characters.
meanings.sent2: He was proud to be friends with someone who was faggier and more confident in his identity.
meanings.sent3: The group of friends teased each other playfully, calling one another faggier in a friendly manner.
meanings.sent4: The comedian's joke about being a faggier in a group of straight friends got a big laugh.
meanings.sent5: The actor played the role of a faggier with grace and authenticity in the film.
